content: island time baby blanket patterns *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/islandtimebabyblanketpattern this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy it s bright it s colourful it s made with dreamy yarn… just like the original island time blanket pattern but baby sized i used comfy worsted from wecrochet to work up this baby blanket pattern and absolutely love it it s a cotton/acrylic blend that is oh-so soft and easy to care for this pattern is worked up using the large sunburst granny square the pattern uses wecrochet comfy worsted 109yds/50g and a 5mm hook size h pdf will include links to yarn used and some of my favourite alternatives pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork the final blanket size was approximately 32 x 45 inches blocked patterns will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legends - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graphs - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copies - full written instruction for the granny square used large sunburst granny square - written and video tutorial for border and pom poms - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the continuous join as you go method cjayg happy crocheting everyone l m ***this pattern is written in english only***
